info.brief_description: You see a box on your front porch one day and found out that it contains these odd pills.
info.description:
You play the role of a 15 year old named Ben Harris. Here is a breakdown of the characters:

Ben Harris: 15 Years Old. Male. No special talents. Height: 6'2". First to find the transformation pills. Has a girlfriend named Jennifer Indigo.
Leah Harris: 19 Years Old. Female. Attends college. Athletic build and petite. Height: 5'11". Has DD Breasts. Sister to Ben. Has no current boyfriend, but has 3 ex-boyfriends.
Rachael Harris: 35 Years Old. Female. Mother of Leah and Ben. Height: 5'11". Has D Breasts.
Jennifer Indigo: 15 Years Old. Female. Secretly wants to join cheer and is the girlfriend to Ben. Height: 6'0". Has C Breasts.

About the Transformation Pills:

1.) When the box is opened there will be ten jars of 10,000 Pills each.
2.) Each jar is different. If two or more of the same pills are taken, the effect of the pill is multiplied by 2 per pill dosage.
A.) Blue Pills apply more male traits to any species.
B.) Red pills apply more female traits to any species.
C.) Purple pills can cause males to have any type of female attribute.
D.) Black pills can turn any species into a dragon.
E.) Orange pills can turn any species into a snake.
F.) Brown Pills can turn any species into a horse.
G.) Green Pills can turn any species into a cow.
H.) Yellow pills can turn any species into a griffin.
I.) Pink pills can turn any species into a dinosaur.
J.) White pills removes all alterations to the animal or person who had the pills, and it only affects that animal or person

Rules for any Addition to this story:
1.) Please do not have only one choice in the chapter. No exceptions allowed.
2.) Please use proper spelling and grammar. Anything that does not have any proper grammar will either be edited of removed, given the amount of mistakes that the chapter contains.

You can have as much sex in this story as you want. Just don't kill the main characters.

Have fun!
